name: Kidz
description: Kidz is 2D Side Scrolling style, featuring different mechanic each episode, including Action Horror, Point & Click, and Parkour! 3 kids from the different universe face the same issue. Let's explore their story!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.0 GHz or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
